title: WordCamp Cincinnati
description: WordCamp Cincinnati 2016 is the first WordCamp ever to be held in Cincinnati! Our inaugural WordCamp will be held at The University of Cincinnati, in the Tangeman University Center. WordCamp attendees will include website developers, bloggers, and business owners that cut across a broad spectrum of interests and experiences. We invite the local and regional community to come down and participate in this immersive WordPress experience!
